definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isday"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="world_data_canseesky"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="block_remove_with_particles"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:KoboldSkeleton</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
